sense.def:
Kadar je človek
ashamed of something
kar je storil, ima zaradi tistega dejanja občutek zadrege ali krivde.

seg.quote: She was ashamed of her tears.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
ashamed to do something
tistega ne želi storiti, ker mu je nerodno.

seg.quote: I bet that's what happened, and you're ashamed to admit it.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
ashamed of someone
s katerim je povezan, je v zadregi zaradi njegovega vedênja.

seg.quote: He was ashamed of her for writing such lies.
